characterDescription:
Thude is a Parshendi warrior in Narak during the War of Reckoning. He is partnered with Bila - a warpair of Eshonai's own personal division.
Thude has trained with Eshonai's Blade and Plate, which she will leave with him, just in case her transformation into stormform somehow goes awry.
He led away the remaining faction of listeners who did not accept stormform transformation, and led them to shelter in the Shattered Plains.[citation needed]
